sqrt^2 = 2 (should equal 2)
2^1/5 = 1.14869835499704 with (2^1/5)^5 = 2
exp(Pi) = 23.1406926327793 with Math.Log(Math.Exp(Math.PI)) = 3.14159265358979 
pi^e = 22.459157718361 with ln(pi^e) = 2.71828182845905 
fgamma(1)=0.999999989064903 	 0!=1
fgamma(2)=0.999999989064903 	 1!=1
fgamma(3)=1.99999997812981 	 2!=2
fgamma(4)=5.99999993438942 	 3!=6
fgamma(5)=23.9999997375577 	 4!=24
fgamma(6)=119.999998687788 	 5!=120
fgamma(7)=719.99999212673 	 6!=720
fgamma(8)=5039.99994488711 	 7!=5040
fgamma(9)=40319.9995590969 	 8!=40320
